title: UAE to withdraw forces from Yemen as tensions rise
description: United Arab Emirates to withdraw forces from Yemen after a Saudi-led coalition air strike ramped up tensions between Riyadh and Abu Dhabi.

# [UAE to withdraw forces from Yemen as tensions rise](https://neoskosmos.com/en/2025/12/31/news/world/uae-to-withdraw-forces-from-yemen-as-tensions-rise/)

The United Arab Emirates will withdraw its forces from Yemen after a Saudi-led coalition air strike ramped up tensions between Riyadh and Abu Dhabi.

![](https://cdn1.neoskosmos.com/uploads/sites/2/2025/12/Yemen-PRINT_11128-1024x576.jpg)

The Saudi-led military coalition has bombed a weapon shipment from the United Arab Emirates after it arrived in Yemen's port of Mukalla for the forces of the Southern Transitional Council (STC), the Yemeni government-run Saba News Agency reported. Photo: AAP/NAJEEB MOHAMED

[AAP - Reuters](https://neoskosmos.com/en/byline/aap-reuters/)

31 December 2025 11:13am

[Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/dialog/feed?app_id=140533932689302&display=page&link=https://neoskosmos.com/en/2025/12/31/news/world/uae-to-withdraw-forces-from-yemen-as-tensions-rise/&redirect_uri=https://neoskosmos.com/app/themes/neoskosmos/window.close.html) [Twitter: @NeosKosmos](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=https://neoskosmos.com/en/2025/12/31/news/world/uae-to-withdraw-forces-from-yemen-as-tensions-rise/&text=UAE%20to%20withdraw%20forces%20from%20Yemen%20as%20tensions%20rise&via=NeosKosmos) [Instagram](mailto:?subject=UAE%20to%20withdraw%20forces%20from%20Yemen%20as%20tensions%20rise&body=https://neoskosmos.com/en/2025/12/31/news/world/uae-to-withdraw-forces-from-yemen-as-tensions-rise/)

The United Arab Emirates says it is pulling out its remaining forces ​in Yemen after Saudi Arabia backed a call for the UAE military to leave the country within 24 hours.

The move followed a Saudi-led coalition air strike ⁠on the southern Yemeni port of Mukalla.

The attack on what Riyadh said was a UAE-linked weapons shipment marked the most significant escalation between Riyadh and Abu Dhabi to date in a widenin
